about.name: Naman Rastogi
about.shortDescription: Dynamic and results-oriented Associate Product Manager with 2+ years of experience driving innovation and growth across various industries. Skilled in collaborating with cross-functional teams, conducting user research, and translating insights into impactful product features. Proven ability to manage the entire product development lifecycle, from ideation to execution, using Agile methodologies. Passionate about creating seamless user experiences and leveraging data to optimize product performance.
about.description: I am a Dynamic Product Manager with 2+ years of Professional Experience in Product and Project domain. Coming from a technical background as a Computer Science Engineer I am very enthuiastic towards new technology and innovation. Skilled in collaborating with cross-functional teams, conducting user research, and translating insights into impactful product features. Proven ability to build both products 0-1 and mature AI/ML products, managing the entire product development lifecycle, from ideation to execution, using Agile methodologies. Passionate about creating seamless user experiences and leveraging data to optimize product performance.

certifications.title: Full-stack web development with react specialization

achievements.title: Winner of DSC WoW Blog writing challenge
achievements.issuer: Google Developer's Student Club WoW Event

achievements.title: Finalist of The Great Indian Alexa Hackathon

tasks: Led Unify Segment POD, successfully launching ‘Ada’ Marketer’s AI-Companion and 2 feature-level enhancements all while collaborating with cross-functional teams and participating in GTM.
Understood the requirements and pain points of clients and did Market Research, this contributed to new product strategies and executions helping us improve client experience.
Built Dashboards for enhanced data visibility for our new feature NCE (Non-customer entity data) which helped clients get 1.5x times more effective marketing strategies.
Conducted Bi-weekly monitoring to track project progress and identify bottlenecks that grow into potential risks, resulting in a 22% reduction in cycle time for bugs, release blockers, etc.
achievements: Succesfully launched 'Ada' AI Assistant for clients
Achieved 22% reduction in cycle time resulting in faster feature delivery
Single handedly managed the entire Project Management side of the Product for two weeks

tasks: Delivered total revamp version of Spell-Check and Pages with simpler/better end-to-end flows.
Took ownership of the new AutoSuggest feature, defining KPI metrics and understanding User behavior, patterns, and trends after extensive User Research.
Improved search functionalities, fetching nearly 18% better traction for the clients, and wrote Product Guide Documentation for clients to yield optimum outputs
achievements: Fetched 18% better traction for Clients which got appreciated by several Clients
Wrote the Product Guide Documentation for overall use in and outside the Organisation
